articles.description: Meanwhile, Biden on Monday urged Americans to get vaccinated, obtain a booster shot, and wear masks in public places.
articles.content:
The omicron variant first discovered in South Africa last week is likely to quickly spread around the globe and could result in "severe consequences," the World Health Organization warned Monday.

articles.title: Virgil Abloh: How trained architect became Louis Vuitton’s most powerful Black executive - The Punch
articles.description: It was a big blow to the global fashion world as the first African-American to head a French luxury fashion house, Virgil Abloh, died on Sunday at the age of 41.
articles.content:
